Html:
Where is the source for the TypeScript Tools for VS?

I'd like to find out why I can't get a NodeJS project (from NodeJS Tools for VS) to auto-generate ".js" files from the ".ts" files. I attempted to edit the ".njsproj" project file to use the same settings and imports as the ".csproj" file generated by the "HTML Application with TypeScript" project template and it didn't work.
After some research it appears that the TypeScript Tools are tied to the C# (and possibly VB) project type GUID, but I can't confirm without source.
